description: To change of use of part of the building (outlined in red in the submitted floor plans) from B1 to D1 for use as a drug and alcohol recovery centre. The centre will run one-to-one group counselling/therapy sessions as well as an education, training and employment programme. Clinical services will run from the site including a needle exchange programme, and will be run by a medical team including GPs and nursing staff. No medication will be kept or administered on site. The set-up will be similar to the other services run by Addaction in Liverpool at 4 Roscoe Street, 8 Maryland Street, 83 - 93 Stonebridge Lane and the Speke Training and Education Centre.
site_address: Garston Business Centre South Liverpool Social Business Centre, 4-12 St Marys Road, Liverpool, L19 2RY
